1.0.name: wordpress/cursor-trail
1.0.description:
Silly little plugin that does little, serves little purpose, but looks kinda cool :).

Provide a new image (or keep the default) and adjust the speed fading in Settings > Cursor Trail. You can also choose a start or/and end date where the cursor will trail, e.g. for holiday season.

Inspired by David Walsh's implementation of this in MooTools - http://davidwalsh.name/mouse-trailer-cursor
